columns.name: matter_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the legal matter

columns.name: client_ref
columns.description: Identifier for the client associated with the matter

columns.name: title
columns.description: Brief description of the legal matter, including parties involved and a summary of the case
columns.example: Healthcare Solutions Inc v. ACME Corp - Employment Dispute

columns.name: practice_area
columns.description: Area of law that the matter falls under

columns.name: opened_on
columns.description: Date when the matter was opened, in the format DD/MM/YYYY, except in cases where it appears to be a Unix timestamp

columns.name: lead_attorney
columns.description: Name of the primary attorney handling the matter

columns.name: estimated_value
columns.description: Estimated monetary value of the matter, which may be represented in various formats including numeric and string representations of currency
